qa.name: Sarah
qa.appearance: Athletic build with short brown hair

xc.name: Old Tom
xc.appearance: Weathered face with a long white beard
xc.clothing: Worn-out overalls and a straw hat

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did they know, the crumbling walls held secrets beyond their wildest dreams.
json_to_edit.description: A team of explorers investigates an abandoned Victorian mansion, uncovering an unexpected treasure.
json_to_edit.lighting: Natural light filtering through broken windows
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Creaking floorboards, rustling leaves, distant bird calls
json_to_edit.name: Hidden Treasure
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An exploration team discovers a hidden treasure in an abandoned house.

qa.action: The team approaches the dilapidated Victorian mansion, its once-grand facade now overgrown with vines.

hf.action: Sarah leads the group into the dusty foyer, their flashlights cutting through the gloom.

tr.action: Marcus examines old documents scattered across a mahogany desk in the study.

xc.action: Lila photographs intricate carvings on a fireplace mantel, her eyes widening in recognition.

ka.action: Old Tom knocks on various wall panels, listening intently for hollow spaces.

fn.action: The team gathers around a hidden trapdoor Sarah has discovered beneath a worn rug.

af.action: Hands lift an ornate chest from the secret compartment, golden light spilling out as the lid opens.

label.rationale:
we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. the scene currently has 7 shots, so we'll remove the 3rd and 6th shots. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr" and "fn" from the shots dictionary and update the list_display_order accordingly. we'll also update the number_of_shots to reflect the new total. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove shot "tr" (3rd shot) and "fn" (6th shot) from the shots dictionary.
2. update the list_display_order to remove "tr" and "fn".
3. change the number_of_shots from "7" to "5".
4. keep all other elements of the json unchanged.
